context: Mid-sized technology company expanding development team, requiring approval for increased recruitment budget to hire 15 senior engineers

request.purpose: Recruitment budget for Q4 2024 hiring surge
request.justification: Critical for product roadmap delivery and maintaining competitive advantage in talent market

decision_process.outcome: Advanced to CFO review with supporting data
Approved with conditions - phased spending approach

business_impact.expected_outcome: 15 senior engineers hired by Q1 2025, accelerating product development by 6 months
business_impact.projected_value: $3.2M in additional revenue from accelerated product launches

outcome_tracking.6_month_review: 12 engineers hired, product development on track, budget at 85% utilization
outcome_tracking.12_month_review: 15 engineers hired, first product launch accelerated by 4 months, ROI tracking shows 45% of projected value realized
outcome_tracking.actual_roi: 78% of projected 3-year value achieved in first 12 months

lessons_learned: Phased approach mitigated budget risk, early market intelligence crucial for competitive hiring, integration planning should start earlier
